languages.text: "Угроза не установлена. Установление природы угрозы — высший приоритет. Сопутствующие потери малозначимы. Запрашиваю разрешение на координацию наступательной операции силами каторжных единиц с целью установления природы нападения".

"The threat is unknown. Establishing the nature of the threat is the top priority. Collateral losses are insignificant. Requesting authorisation to coordinate an offensive operation to be carried out by penal battalions in order to determine the nature of the attack."
languages.original_text: "Угроза не установлена. Установление природы угрозы — высший приоритет. Сопутствующие потери малозначимы. Запрашиваю разрешение на координацию наступательной операции силами каторжных единиц с целью установления природы нападения".

traits.locale_text: "The threat is unknown. Establishing the nature of the threat is a top priority. The collateral losses are insignificant. Requesting authorization to coordinate an offensive operation carried out by the forces of the convicted units to determine the nature of the attack."

languages.text: “目前尚不清楚这一威胁的情况。因此，当务之急就是确定威胁的性质，附带损失微不足道。请求授权，允许本单位协调由惩戒营进行的进攻行动，从而确定敌方袭击的性质。”
languages.original_text: "The threat is unknown. Establishing the nature of the threat is the top priority. Collateral losses are insignificant. Requesting authorisation to coordinate an offensive operation to be carried out by penal battalions in order to determine the nature of the attack."

traits.locale_text: “目前尚不清楚这一威胁的情况。因此，当务之急就是确定威胁的性质，附带损失微不足道。请求授权，允许本单位协调由惩戒营进行的进攻行动，从而确定敌方袭击的性质。”

languages.text: «Se desconoce la amenaza. Establecer la naturaleza de la amenaza es la máxima prioridad. Las pérdidas colaterales son insignificantes. Solicito autorización para coordinar una operación ofensiva a cargo de batallones penales para determinar la naturaleza del ataque».
languages.original_text: "The threat is unknown. Establishing the nature of the threat is the top priority. Collateral losses are insignificant. Requesting authorisation to coordinate an offensive operation to be carried out by penal battalions in order to determine the nature of the attack."

traits.locale_text: «Se desconoce la amenaza. Establecer la naturaleza de la amenaza es la máxima prioridad. Las pérdidas colaterales son insignificantes. Solicito autorización para coordinar una operación ofensiva a cargo de batallones penales para determinar la naturaleza del ataque».

languages.text: 「脅威の程は未知数です。まず、脅威の正体を明らかにすることが最優先でしょう。付随して生じる損失はそれほど大きくはありません。攻撃の性質を見極めるために、懲罰部隊が実行する攻撃作戦を調整する許可を要請します」
languages.original_text: "The threat is unknown. Establishing the nature of the threat is the top priority. Collateral losses are insignificant. Requesting authorisation to coordinate an offensive operation to be carried out by penal battalions in order to determine the nature of the attack."

traits.locale_text: 「脅威の程は未知数です。まず、脅威の正体を明らかにすることが最優先でしょう。付随して生じる損失はそれほど大きくはありません。攻撃の性質を見極めるために、懲罰部隊が実行する攻撃作戦を調整する許可を要請します」

languages.text: « Menace inconnue. La priorité est d'en déterminer la nature. Les pertes collatérales étant sans importance, je demande l'autorisation de coordonner une opération avec les bataillons carcéraux pour déterminer la nature de l'agression. »
languages.original_text: "The threat is unknown. Establishing the nature of the threat is the top priority. Collateral losses are insignificant. Requesting authorisation to coordinate an offensive operation to be carried out by penal battalions in order to determine the nature of the attack."

traits.locale_text: « Menace inconnue. La priorité est d'en déterminer la nature. Les pertes collatérales étant sans importance, je demande l'autorisation de coordonner une opération avec les bataillons carcéraux pour déterminer la nature de l'agression. »

languages.text: "Die Bedrohung ist unbekannt. Oberste Priorität hat es daher, das Wesen dieser Bedrohung zu ergründen. Kollateralverluste sind unbedeutend. Erbitte Autorisierung, eine Offensivoperation durch Strafbataillone koordinieren zu dürfen, um das Wesen des Angriffs zu bestimmen."
languages.original_text: "The threat is unknown. Establishing the nature of the threat is the top priority. Collateral losses are insignificant. Requesting authorisation to coordinate an offensive operation to be carried out by penal battalions in order to determine the nature of the attack."

traits.locale_text: "Die Bedrohung ist unbekannt. Oberste Priorität hat es daher, das Wesen dieser Bedrohung zu ergründen. Kollateralverluste sind unbedeutend. Erbitte Autorisierung, eine Offensivoperation durch Strafbataillone koordinieren zu dürfen, um das Wesen des Angriffs zu bestimmen."

languages.text: "Tehlike meçhul. En büyük öncelik, tehdidin niteliğini anlamak olmalı. Bu uğurda verilecek kayıplar önemsiz. Saldırının mahiyetini belirlemek amacıyla cezai taburlarca yürütülecek bir hücum harekâtı için izin talep ediliyor."
languages.original_text: "The threat is unknown. Establishing the nature of the threat is the top priority. Collateral losses are insignificant. Requesting authorisation to coordinate an offensive operation to be carried out by penal battalions in order to determine the nature of the attack."
